docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.123
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
Text Only
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 问题
docs.text: 1.​创建​项目​ mkdocs new my-project 2.​启动​网站​本地​服务器​ cd my-project mkdocs serve ，​地址​http://127.0.0.1:8000/ 3.​生成​静态​网站​ mkdocs built

docs.title: Blog
docs.text: ​博客​，​仅​音译​，​英文​名为​Blogger，​为​Web Log​的​混成​词​。 ​写​博客​的​目的​是​记录​思考​，​当​生活​的​备忘录​。
